description:
Gregor von Mückenberger was an Imperial Fleet Admiral and one of three military chiefs of staff under Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch206 [Friedrich IV], during the waning years of the Goldenbaum Dynasty. Mückenberger was considered to be a competent leader and became one of the first Imperial elites to acknowledge the capabilities of http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]. He decided to retire shortly after the death of Kaiser Friedrich IV and just before the outbreak of the civil war in the Empire, refusing overtures from the nobility of the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League] to support them.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Gregor von Muckenberger
